originqi.name: Origin Qi
originqi.description: During the ancient times, some experts refer to this thing as Origin Qi. This is a mysterious energy that was formed with the world. Only after absorbing the Origin Qi will one be able to successfully breakthrough the barrier to the Fight God class. Every plane would have some Origin Qi being formed when it was created. However, Origin Qi cannot be created again. In other words, every Origin Qi exhausted would led to it being diminished in this world. A Fight God practitioner is an existence that surpass this world. The birth of every Fight God would greatly exhaust quite a lot of Origin Qi. In the face of this expenditure without replenishment, it would eventually reach a point where nothing remain. This is the reason why the Dou Qi continent rarely produces any Fight Gods. This is because the current Dou Qi continent no longer has any Origin Qi.
originqi.effect_description: Help in breaking through to God Realm as well as in refining t10 pills

strpill.name: Amassing Strength Pill
strpill.description:
This Amassing Strength Pill has the effect of causing the user to gain some strength for a short while after consuming it.

*"Strength is the basis of even hoping to stand upon these lands."*

conpill.name: Congeal Flame Pill
conpill.description:
Congeal Flame Pill is a solidified flame in the form of a pill. It is used to temporarily gain a flame.

*"With the ambition for strength comes the ignition of the flames of war."*
conpill.effect_description: Grants a one time use flame

healpill.name: Wound Healing Pill
healpill.description:
The Wound Healing Pill is in high demand by mercenaries.

*"Scars are reminders of experience for those well adversed in combat, though these pills will leave no scars."*

recpill.name: Energy Recovery Pill
recpill.description:
The Energy Recovery Pill is a pill that, when taken, replenishes Dou Qi and invigorates the body.

*"Though strength from one's self is in its purest and strongest, it is not shameful to find sustenance through pills."*

pathpill.name: Path Protecting Pill
pathpill.description:
Path Protecting Pill has the effect of protecting your Qi Paths when swallowing beast flames.

*"The path for power lies ahead,
the pill shall guard one's life from dread"*
pathpill.effect_description: Increases chance of swallowing a beast flame by 20%. If paired with Icy Heart Pill, increase chance boost to 25%. Does not apply to Heavenly Flames

icypill.name: Icy Heart Pill
icypill.description:
Upon use, the user will become unconscious, letting the Icy Heart Pill assist in the process of swallowing beast flames.

*"With steadied heart, silent as ice,
With frozen pill, it shall suffice"*
icypill.effect_description: Increases chance of swallowing a beast flame by 20%. If paired with Path Protecting Pill, increase chance boost to 25%. Does not apply to Heavenly Flames

bonepill.name: Bone Growing Pill
bonepill.description:
Bone Growing Pill is a kind of medicinal pill used to cure those who are seriously injured.

*"Grow a spine"*

refpill.name: Refreshing Pill
refpill.description:
Refreshing Pill causes the user to be more sensitive to the outside world's natural energy when training, increasing the speed at which one absorbs energy.

*"A slight boost on a rigorous path."*

windpill.name: Wind Walking Pill
windpill.description:
After consuming Wind Walking Pill, ones speed will soar for a short period of time.

*"Brisked with the freedom of wind, you'll soar"*

ordinary_lure.name: Ordinary Magical Beast Lure
ordinary_lure.description:
A normal lure for magical beasts on the Dou Qi Continent.

*"But for those creatures, just a hint of magic in air,
The Ordinary Lure, a simple yet fair affair,
Still it calls and tames, with a gentle sway,
Bringing the mystical creatures out to play."*
ordinary_lure.effect_description: For the next 10 magical beast hunts, only get Rank 1-3 magical beasts.

burnblood.name: Burning Blood
burnblood.description:
When spread onto the body, Burning Blood can increase internal consumption of Dou Qi and also speed up recovery of Dou Qi.

*"Careful, it's hot"*
burnblood.effect_description: Permanently increases CP by 5% and EXP gain by 5%. Only consumable once

gspirit1pill.name: One-Lined Green Spirit Pill
gspirit1pill.description: A One-Lined Green Spirit Pill is able to increase a Fight Master's or Fight Grandmaster's cultivation by one star.
gspirit1pill.effect_description: If user is betweeen 1-star Fight Master and 3-star Fight Grandmaster, directly promote user by one star. Otherwise, no effect. Only consumable once

gspirit2pill.name: Two-Lined Green Spirit Pill
gspirit2pill.description: A Two-Lined Green Spirit Pill is able to increase a Fight Master's or Fight Grandmaster's cultivation by two stars.
gspirit2pill.effect_description: If user is Fight Master, user has 90% chance to promote two stars or 10% chance to decline one star. If user is a Fight Grandmaster below 4-star Fight Grandmaster, directly promote user by two stars. Otherwise, no effect. Only consumable once

gspirit3pill.name: Three-Lined Green Spirit Pill
gspirit3pill.description: A Three-Lined Green Spirit Pill is able to increase a Fight Master's or Fight Grandmaster's cultivation by three stars.
gspirit3pill.effect_description: If user is Fight Master, user has 85% chance to promote three stars, 10% chance to decline one star, or 5% chance to decline two stars. If user is a Fight Grandmaster below 4-star Fight Grandmaster, directly promote user by three stars. Otherwise, no effect. Only consumable once

purpheartpill.name: Purple Heart Barrier Breaking Pill
purpheartpill.description:
A Purple Heart Barrier Breaking Pill is able to increase a Fight Grandmaster's cultivation by one star.

*"The Purple Heart Barrier Breaking Pill, a gift from above,
Increases power, unlocking strength and love,
One star it grants, to the Fight Grandmaster bold,
Breaking barriers, to reach new heights untold."*
purpheartpill.effect_description: If user is a Fight Grandmaster below 9-star Fight Grandmaster, directly promote user by one star. Otherwise no effect. Consumable twice

beastpill.name: Beast Strength Pill
beastpill.description:
The Beast Strength Pill increases the strength of the person who consumed it by a little for a short period of time.

*"Though the strength of humans are formidable, the brutal strength of beasts can prove to be more effective."*

bloodlotuspill.name: Blood Lotus Pill
bloodlotuspill.description:
After consumption of Blood Lotus Essence Pill, a strange bloody layer will be formed on the surface of a person. This bloody layer can withstand exposure to extreme heat.

*"The Blood Lotus is known for it's heat warding properties."*
bloodlotuspill.effect_description: Increases chance of swallowing a Heavenly Flame for the first time by 50%. Applies to Beast Flames as well

dragonpill.name: Dragon Strength Pill
dragonpill.description:
"The Blood Lotus is known for it's heat warding properties."

*"Though the brute strength of a beast may be strong, the dragon's lineage far overshadows its adversaries."*

qimendpill.name: Qi Mending Pill
qimendpill.description: Qi Mending Pill allows a Fight Emperor or Fight Ancestor to recover their Dou Qi at a faster rate,
qimendpill.effect_description: If user is Fight Ancestor or below, grants 50% CP Boost for 1 battle (Unstackable)

yuanpill.name: Yuan Recovery Pill
yuanpill.description: Yuan Recovery Pill is specially used to treat some serious injuries. It could be called the ultimate medicinal pill to treat serious injuries.

fspiritpill.name: Fight Spirit Pill
fspiritpill.description:
A Fight Spirit Pill is able to increase a Fight King's cultivation by one star.

*"What is a king without spirit and ambition?"*
fspiritpill.effect_description: If user is a Fight King below 9-star Fight King, directly promote user by one star. Otherwise no effect. Only consumable once

groundpill.name: Ground Spirit Pill
groundpill.description:
The Ground Spirit Pill is a necessary pill for swallowing Fallen Heart Flame.

*"Spirit of the Earth,
Flames of the Hearth,
Origin of our Birth,
Proves of your Worth"*
groundpill.effect_description: It is a required pill while swallowing the Fallen Heart Flame. No additional effects.

mightypill.name: Mighty Huang Pill
mightypill.description:
Using a Mighty Huang Pill would allow a Fight Emperor to raise their strength one or two stars for a short period of time. Moreover, it has another use of refining ones bones.

*"The soverign's name dicates their right of rule,
On this continent so blessed yet so cruel."*
mightypill.effect_description: If user is 8-star Fight Emperor, promote by one star. If user is a Fight Emperor below 8-star Fight Emperor, 80% chance to promote one star and 20% chance to promote two stars. Otherwise no effect. Only consumable once

zongpill.name: Zong Breaking Pill
zongpill.description:
A Zong Breaking Pill is able to allow an expert at the peak of Fight Emperor to have a greater success rate when advancing to a Fight Ancestor.

*"Look past the allure of kinghood, for true power lies in the mastery of battle."*
zongpill.effect_description: If user is 9-star Fight Emperor, add 2200 EXP to their total amount. Otherwise no effect. Only consumable once

advance_lure.name: Advanced Magical Beast Lure
advance_lure.description:
A great lure for magical beasts on the Dou Qi Continent.

*"For the beasts of magic, wild and true,
The Advanced Lure whispers a sweet adieu,
With a stronger pull, it lures them near,
Captivating their hearts, taming their fear."*
advance_lure.effect_description: For the next 15 magical beast hunts, only get Rank 4-6 magical beasts.

yypill.name: Yin-Yang Mysterious Dragon Pill
yypill.description:
The use of the Yin-Yang Mysterious Dragon Pill is not to directly enable one to raise ones strength, but to allow one to stand after breaking!

*"Only through one's self-purging
Shall one see the dragon emerging"*
yypill.effect_description: After consuming this pill and user is defeated in a battle, permanently increase CP by 25%. Only consumable once

devourpill.name: Life Devouring Pill
devourpill.description:
The Life Devouring Pill is able to forcefully raise the strength of someone around Fight Grandmaster all the way to Fight King at the cost of a shortened lifespan.

*"A small loan to pay for power."*
devourpill.effect_description: Directly increase a Fight Grandmaster's strength to 1-star Fight King. If user does not consume a Life Returning Pill within 336 hours (2 weeks), reset user's EXP to 0.

returnpill.name: Life Returning Pill
returnpill.description:
The Life Returning Pill is a pill able to save one persons life.

*"The debt has been paid in full"*
returnpill.effect_description: If consumed after within 336 hours (2 weeks) after use of Life Devouring Pill, prevents user from getting EXP reset to 0.

elemheartpill.name: Elemental Heart Pill
elemheartpill.description:
If an Elemental Heart Pill is consumed when refining a pill, it will aid in stabilizing the mind. Hence, it increases the chance of successful pill refinement.

*"Earth shall help solidify,
Wind shall guide your mind,
Water shall lead your technique,
Fire shall fuel your will.
The elements shall guide your creation"*
elemheartpill.effect_description: After consumption, increases the success rate of refining the next pill by 10%. (Unstackable)

instqipill.name: Instant Qi Pill
instqipill.description: Instant Qi Pill allows one to recover some Dou Qi within a short period of time. Moreover, it is quite effective when a Fight Ancestor consumes it. However, this kind of pill is very expensive.

flamedemonpill.name: Flame Demon Quiet Mysterious Pill
flamedemonpill.description: If a person consumes a Flame Demon Quiet Mysterious Pill, there is a chance for their Dou Qi to undergo a transformation, increasing ones fighting strength.
flamedemonpill.effect_description: After consumption, grants 50% chance of permanently increasing user's CP by 50%. Can repeatedly consume until buff is granted, after which there will be no effect

bodhipill.name: Great Bodhisattva Return Pill
bodhipill.description:
In the novel, this pill increases the chance that a Bodhisattva Pill provides in breaking through to the Half-Saint class by two times.

*"By the words of his eminence, the cycle of samsara is a path forward; to walk on this path and experience life is the joy and pain of those with soul."*
bodhipill.effect_description: Directly promotes user from 10th Change Peak Fight Venerate to Initial Half-Saint. Only consumable once

pinnacle_lure.name: Pinnacle Magical Beast Lure
pinnacle_lure.description:
The supreme lure for magical beasts on the Dou Qi Continent.

*"In the land of the Dou Qi, where magic roams free,
The Pinnacle Lure doth summon with glee,
The most mythical beasts, to answer its call,
Its power and grace, standing tall."*
pinnacle_lure.effect_description: For the next 25 magical beast hunts, only get Rank 7-9 magical beasts.

godpill.name: God Pill
godpill.description:
The God Pill, which contains Origin Qi, allows a peak Fight Saint to advance to Fight God.

*"What others consider as the peak is only the beginning."*
godpill.effect_description: Directly promotes user from 9-star Advanced Fight Saint to Fight God. Only consumable once

qiflame_a.name: Dou Qi Flame
qiflame_a.description: Flame made of qi. Helps in refining pills

qiflame_b.name: Dou Qi Flame
qiflame_b.description: Flame made of qi. Helps in refining pills

qiflame_c.description: Flame made of qi. Helps in refining pills

qiflame_d.description: Flame made of qi. Helps in refining pills

qiflame_e.description: Flame made of qi. Helps in refining pills

qiflame_f.description: Flame made of qi. Helps in refining pills

qiflame_g.description: Flame made of qi. Helps in refining pills

qiflame_h.name: Dou Qi Flame
qiflame_h.description: Flame made of qi. Helps in refining pills

qiflame_i.name: Dou Qi Flame
qiflame_i.description: Flame made of qi. Helps in refining pills

lring.name: Low-Grade Storage Ring
lring.description: Storage ring with inventory size of 3,200wt.

mring.name: Middle-Grade Storage Ring
mring.description: Storage ring with inventory size of 24,000wt.

hring.name: High-Grade Storage Ring
hring.description: Storage ring with inventory size of 180,000wt.

accept_stone.name: Acceptance Stone
accept_stone.description: A special storage which gives you ability to get bonus flame effect

goldbar.name: Gold Bar
goldbar.description: A gold bar equivalent to 5,000 gold.
